repairedDockerfile:
# stream oriented kurento
#
# VERSION               4.4.3

FROM      ubuntu:16.04
MAINTAINER Patxi Gort√°zar <patxi.gortazar@gmail.com>
MAINTAINER Fede Diaz <nordri@gmail.com>

RUN apt-get update \
  && apt-get -y dist-upgrade \
	&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y wget && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN echo "deb http://ubuntu.kurento.org/ xenial-dev kms6" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kurento.list \
	&& wget -O - https://ubuntu.kurento.org/kurento.gpg.key | apt-key add - \
	&& apt-get update \
	&& apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install kurento-media-server-6.0 \
	&& apt-get clean \
  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

EXPOSE 8888

COPY ./entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh

ENV GST_DEBUG=Kurento*:5

ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
